channel.title: Scar question
channel.description: i tried a scar script that is supposed to cut willows in draynor and bank them, i don't know alot about this but it said for the instructions to drag the crose hairs over the cilent which is the blue bar over runescape right? then u hit the green button and then pick a color? i know where that little button is that you click and a box shows up and shows you what color the cursor is on but what am i supposed to pick? what color? and after i put the crose hairs on the cilent it said failed when compiling? what did i do wrong? sorry, i dont know alot about this, im new to scripts and mopar and i am truley sorry if i posted this in the wrong section if i did please tell me where i should have posted it thank you.

item.title: Scar question
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

I Suggest trying a new scirpt if thats too hard for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Scar question
item.dc:creator: @iluvrs iluvrs
item.description:
@iluvrs wrote:

I did not write this script, im just useing it. i have figuard alot of things out from trying it over and over again, but it always said failed to compile so i must not be putting the colors in right? and how is your nick different from yuor name? and in the willow script i was useing it said
function GotColor(ColorType: string): Boolean;
begin
case LowerCase(ColorType) of
‘bank’ : Result := (BankColor > 0);
‘road’ : Result := (RoadColor > 0);
‘ladder’: Result := (LadderColor > 0);
‘quest’ : Result := (QuestColor > 0);
‘farm’ : Result := (FarmingColor > 0);
so i filled the colros out but it didn’t ask for the colors of the trees. and i dont know what he means buy ladder? where is there a ladder in draynor bank
and bellow this later on it would say
if(QuestColor = 0)then
QuestColor := SLGetSymbol(ax, ay, ‘quest’);
so do i have to put the number in quest sing again? and it would also say
if(BarColor = 0)then
BarColor := SLGetSyimbol(ax, ay, ‘bar’);
if(BarColor <> 0)then
if FindColor(ax, ay, BarColor, MMX1, MMY1, MMX2, MMY2) then
so do i have to put the color fo the bar in to? this is willow whacker script made by Lorax and Similion it says it’s an auto picker but i know that runescape switches the colors so u have to reset colors each time yuo relog back in. please help.

Read full topic

item.title: Scar question
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

your script has forms , just run it.

Read full topic

item.title: Scar question
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

I really would try something less advanced with your scripting skills, not to be blunt or anything. For DTM’s and or bitmaps look in the tut section, there are some great tutorials on them. And also, get familiar with SRL and its procedures. Use its manual.

Read full topic

item.title: Scar question
item.dc:creator: @iluvrs iluvrs
item.description:
@iluvrs wrote:

ok ill move it back in that that script that i was useing it didn;t say what colors to pick in the instructions?
nvm i just saw that thing at the top if this forum that tells you how my bad. but the only thing i still dont get on the script where it says color picker in forum itprocedure BrokenDTM;
begin
Broken := DTMFromString(‘78DA8D924B0E80200C445BF97F12AEE52D5C7’ +
‘B6C4FA265815113E94CC294C50B1D281C88C8D34BEBB6D3219565’ +
‘9D224EB2A9F4113F5C6A142B0AD37B6585E95992C258B1A8300BC’ +
‘8048531620EC863807B19E00D3526034C01983E4F0B300EE8E5FF’ +
‘9936320785490093E7336D234F52983AFF87F73905C853E7CC055’ +
‘2DC081A’);
What color am i supposed to pick for that? and theres all sorts of weird words like, bankersdtm? what is dtm? and DTMFromstring? but it said all i have to do is fill in the pink with colors in the forum section what about this? laFirst.Caption := ‘1st Tree color’ or this “MS Sans Serif”? or this “Player form”? sorry if this was over welming lol, and where to you type your nick in so there will be anti randoms?

Read full topic

item.title: Scar question
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

iluvrs:

i tried a scar script that is supposed to cut willows in draynor and bank them, i don’t know alot about this but it said for the instructions to drag the crose hairs over the cilent which is the blue bar over runescape right?

Actually, it’s the RuneScape window where your character is moving etc.

iluvrs:

then u hit the green button and then pick a color?

Actually, you pick the colors first, unless the script you’re using has forms, of course.

iluvrs:

i know where that little button is that you click and a box shows up and shows you what color the cursor is on but what am i supposed to pick? what color?

See the instructions in the script you are about to run.

iluvrs:

and after i put the crose hairs on the cilent it said failed when compiling? what did i do wrong?

Did you pick the colors needed? If you did, it might be an error in your script.

iluvrs:

sorry, i dont know alot about this, im new to scripts and mopar and i am truley sorry if i posted this in the wrong section if i did please tell me where i should have posted it thank you.

It’s OK. Moving to SCAR Help section.

Read full topic

item.title: Scar question

item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

Just drag the cross hair over runescape game then start the script :).
